name: Taira no Kiyomori
skill: Deals 1503/1843 DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority). Targets take 15%/18% more DMG for a limited time.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the samurai who became the first prime minister of Japan during the Heian Period. He slowly worked his way up to the position over the course of his life, and is very confident, with the work ethic to back it up. Lots of people love him because of the way he cares about everyone he meets. Given the terrible fires and other misfortune born from misunderstandings during his lifetime, he now tries to constantly create safe spaces where everyone can interact and come to agreement. He's definitely not just doing it for fun!
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Obtained after clearing Chapter 10.
◦ Available in Jewel Summon after clearing Chapter 10.

skill: "You'd be surprised what a samurai can do."
summon: "You wanna teach ME? That's not the right kind of attitude!"
